name: Ext.ux.colorpick.Selector
doc:
Sencha Pro Services presents xtype "colorselector". API has been kept as close to the regular colorpicker as possible. The Selector can be rendered to any container.

The defaul selected color is configurable via value config. Usually used in forms via Ext.ux.colorpick.Button or Ext.ux.colorpick.Field.

Typically you will need to listen for the change event to be notified when the user chooses a color. Alternatively, you can bind to the "value" config

Ext.create('Ext.ux.colorpick.Selector', {
    value: '993300',  // initial selected color
    renderTo: Ext.getBody(),
    listeners: {
        change: function (colorselector, color) {
            console.log('New color: ' + color);
        }
    }
});

members.name: alphaDecimalFormat
members.doc: The format used by Ext.util.Format.number to format the alpha channel's value.
members.short_doc:
The format used by Ext.util.Format.number to format the alpha channel's
value. ...

members.name: color
members.doc: This config property is used internally by the UI to maintain the full color. Changes to this config are automatically reflected in value and vise-versa. Setting value can, however, cause the alpha to be dropped if the new value does not contain an alpha component.
members.short_doc: This config property is used internally by the UI to maintain the full color. ...

members.name: fieldPad
members.doc: {Number} padding between the sliders and HEX/R/G/B fields.
members.short_doc: {Number} padding between the sliders and HEX/R/G/B fields. ...

members.name: fieldWidth
members.doc: {Number} Width of the text fields on the container (excluding HEX); since the width of the slider containers is the same as the text field under it (it's the same vbox column), changing this value will also affect the spacing between the sliders.
members.short_doc:
{Number} Width of the text fields on the container (excluding HEX);
since the width of the slider containers is the s...

members.name: format
members.doc:
The color format to for the value config. The value can be set using any supported format or named color, but the stored value will always be in this format.

Supported formats are:

  • hex6 - For example "ffaa00" (Note: does not preserve transparency).
  • hex8 - For example "ffaa00ff" - the last 2 digits represent transparency

  • hex6 - For example "#ffaa00" (same as "hex6" but with a leading "#").

  • hex8 - For example "#ffaa00ff" (same as "hex8" but with a leading "#").

  • rgb - For example "rgb(255,255,0)" (Note: does not preserve transparency).
  • rgba - For example "rgba(255,255,0,.25)"
  • HEX6 - Same as "hex6" but upper case.
  • HEX8 - Same as "hex8" but upper case.

  • HEX6 - Same as "#hex6" but upper case.

  • HEX8 - Same as "#hex8" but upper case.

  • RGB - Same as "rgb" but upper case.
  • RGBA - Same as "rgba" but upper case.
members.short_doc: The color format to for the value config. ...

members.name: showOkCancelButtons
members.doc: Whether Ok and Cancel buttons (in upper right, below the selected color preview) should be shown; these are relied upon by the Ext.ux.colorpick.Button and the Ext.ux.colorpick.Field.
